articles.description: Top Gun: Maverick finally has a May 2022 release date, and the action looks top notch. The long-awated Top Gun sequel teams Cruise with Miles Teller, who plays the son of Goose.

articles.author: Ellie Cook
articles.title: 'We reject you!' Kate and William's 'charm offensive' denounced as fury at royals explodes - Express
articles.description: KATE, DUCHESS OF CAMBRIDGE, and Prince William's tour of the Caribbean has been slammed as 'sharp opposition to the needs and aspirations' of the Caribbean people by a human rights group.

articles.description: The TV presenter, 44, told how she woke up with streaming eyes and a swollen face and had ditched her contact lenses for glasses.
